TopicTitle: Add stats to a part? And other misc questions.

Articles.Content:
I have few questions for the mod I'm working on, any help is greatly appreciated!

1. How would I go about adding stats view-able in the VAB/SPH.

2. How would I add things to a parts right click menu?

3. What would be the best way of adding a new PartModule to a bunch of parts (in my case most of the stock parts). I'm currently looking at ModuleManager as the best way to deal with this.

4. What exactly does explosionPotential do? I read about Harv saying that it makes a bigger explosion graphic and applies a force to nearby objects, but as far as I can tell, its been deprecated.

If I have anymore I'll add them, thanks for the help!
